author: cnbc.com
title: Dillard’s, Inc. Announces $0.10 Cash Dividend
text:
LITTLE ROCK, Ark.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Dillard’s, Inc. (NYSE:DDS) (the “Company” or “Dillard’s”) announced that the Board of Directors declared a cash dividend of $0.10 per share on the Class A and Class B Common Stock of the Company payable August 6, 2018 to shareholders of record as of June 29, 2018.
View source version on businesswire.com : https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180519005088/en/
Dillard’s, Inc.
Julie Johnson Guymon, 501-376-5965
Source: Dillard’s, Inc.
